basics.name: Dr. Mohamed El Fadil
basics.label: Physician | Healthcare AI Innovator | Founder & CEO of BrainSAIT
basics.summary: Physician and healthcare AI architect with 10+ years of comprehensive experience spanning clinical practice, healthcare AI innovation, and interoperability systems. Founder and CEO of BrainSAIT, creator of published PyPI packages (brainsait-pyheart & brainsait-pybrain), and expert in FHIR/HL7 standards, Clinical NLP, and healthcare interoperability.

work.name: BrainSAIT
work.summary: Established and lead BrainSAIT, developing comprehensive healthcare AI ecosystem with multiple production platforms. Created and published PyPI packages (brainsait-pyheart & brainsait-pybrain) for healthcare interoperability and AI intelligence.

work.name: Anfas Medical Care Hospital
work.summary: Provided comprehensive critical care services in intensive care unit settings, managing complex patient cases and implementing evidence-based treatment protocols.

work.name: Aster Sanad Hospital
work.summary: Specialized in neurosurgical procedures and patient care, contributing to multidisciplinary treatment teams.

work.name: Rafa Medical Center
work.summary: Delivered emergency medical care in high-pressure environments, demonstrating rapid decision-making capabilities.

education.institution: Institute for Healthcare Improvement, Boston, USA

publications.name: OI vs AI - Original Intelligence vs Artificial Intelligence
publications.summary: Comprehensive book exploring the relationship between Original Intelligence (human brain) and Artificial Intelligence in healthcare, contributing to academic discourse on AI integration in medical practice.

projects.name: brainsait-pyheart
projects.summary: Open-source Healthcare Interoperability & Workflow Engine with event-driven architecture, HIPAA compliance, and FHIR/HL7 standards support. Available via: pip install brainsait-pyheart

projects.name: brainsait-pybrain
projects.summary: Open-source Unified Healthcare Intelligence Platform with AI-powered data harmonization, Clinical NLP engine, and federated learning framework.

projects.name: GIVC Platform
projects.summary: Global Intelligent Virtual Care platform for comprehensive healthcare AI ecosystem.

projects.name: BrainSAIT Healthcare Platform
projects.summary: Complete AI-powered healthcare platform with medical imaging, transcription, and comprehensive AI tools.
